text: Amhi tumace tonda varanvara akasakade vara hota asalele pahata ahota, ata amhi tumhala tya kiblakade phiravuna de'u jyamule tumhi khusa vhala. Tumhi apale tonda masjide harama (kaba) kade phiravuna ghya ani tumhi kothehi asa, apale tonda tyacyacakade phiravuna gheta ja. Granthadharakanna, hi gosta allahatarphe satya asanyace khare jnana ahe ani sarvasrestha allaha tyancya tya karmampasuna gaphila nahi, ji karme he karatata
